autotransform.filter package

Submodules

autotransform.filter.base module

The base class and associated classes for Filter components.

class autotransform.filter.base.Filter(params: autotransform.filter.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.filter.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Filter components. Used by AutoTransform to determine if an Item from an Input is eligible for transformation.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Filter. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

_inverted

Whether to invert the results of the Filter.

Type

bool

bundle() → autotransform.filter.base.FilterBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

FilterBundle

classmethod from_data(inverted: Optional[bool], data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.filter.base.Filter

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid. Handles the inversion capabilities of the Filter.

Parameters

  • data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

  • inverted (Optional[bool]) – Whether the Filter was inverted before encoding.

Returns

An instance of the Filter.

Return type

Filter

get_params() → autotransform.filter.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Filter.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Filter.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.filter.type.FilterType

Used to map Filter components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Filter.

Return type

FilterType

invert() → autotransform.filter.base.Filter

Inverts the results that the Filter will provide. Inverting an already inverted Filter will return it to normal operation.

Returns

The Filter after setting the inversion.

Return type

Filter

is_valid(item: autotransform.item.base.Item) → bool

Check whether an Item is valid based on the Filter and handle inversion.

Parameters

item (Item) – The Item to check.

Returns

Returns True if the Item is eligible for transformation

Return type

bool

class autotransform.filter.base.FilterBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Filter object used for JSON encoding.

inverted: Optional[bool]
params: Mapping[str, Any]
type: autotransform.filter.type.FilterType

autotransform.filter.factory module

A simple factory for producing Filters from type and param information.

class autotransform.filter.factory.FilterFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Filters. Maps a type to a Filter.

_map

A mapping from FilterType to the from_data function of the appropriate Filter.

Type

Dict[FilterType, Callable[[bool, Mapping[str, Any]], Filter]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.filter.base.FilterBundle) → autotransform.filter.base.Filter

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (FilterBundle) – The bundled Filter type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Filter.

Return type

Filter

autotransform.filter.regex module

The implementation for regex based filters, including RegexFilter and FileContentRegexFilter.

class autotransform.filter.regex.FileContentRegexFilter(params: autotransform.filter.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.filter.base.Filter[autotransform.filter.regex.FileContentRegexFilterParams]

A Filter which only passes FileItems where the file’s content contains a match to the provided regex pattern. Uses re.search rather than re.match.

params

Contains the pattern to check against the content of the file.

Type

FileContentRegexFilterParams

static get_type() → autotransform.filter.type.FilterType

Used to map Filter components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Filter.

Return type

FilterType

class autotransform.filter.regex.FileContentRegexFilterParams

Bases: TypedDict

The param type for a FileContentRegexFilter.

pattern: str
class autotransform.filter.regex.RegexFilter(params: autotransform.filter.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.filter.base.Filter[autotransform.filter.regex.RegexFilterParams]

A Filter which only passes Items where the Item’s key matches a provided regex pattern. Uses re.search rather than re.match.

params

Contains the pattern to check against the key.

Type

RegexFilterParams

static get_type() → autotransform.filter.type.FilterType

Used to map Filter components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Filter.

Return type

FilterType

class autotransform.filter.regex.RegexFilterParams

Bases: TypedDict

The param type for a RegexFilter.

pattern: str

autotransform.filter.type module

The type of Filter, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.filter.type.FilterType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Filter to type mapping.

FILE_CONTENT_REGEX = 'file_content_regex'
REGEX = 'regex'

Module contents

Filters are used by AutoTransform to take keys provided by Inputs and check them for eligibility. Input keys that pass Filters will get passed along to Batchers.
